title: If ‘O’ is the incenter of triangle XYZ and angle X = 50°, then what is the value of angle YOZ? - Quora

response.answer_text: If ‘O’ is the incenter of triangle XYZ then - Angle YOZ = 90°+50°/2 Angle YOZ = 115° Here it is an Incenter (I) Property —👇👇👇

The incenter of a triangle is the center of the circle inside the triangle If O is the center the 4 sided polygon has 2 Right angles and one angle X X is 50 degrees We know that if n is the number of sides of a polygon the sum of the internal angles is n_2)*180 Since n is 4the angle XOY is 360_90–90–50=130degrees😊
